name: Running Against Time
description:
Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move and Spacebar to jump.

KNOWN BUG: Currently there's a bug where the WebGL build of the game appears blurry, this is quickly fixed by Zooming in/out on your web browser. I'm not sure what causes this bug as it appears fine in downloaded builds of the game.

Running Against Time is a 2D Platformer in which you race against a counting down clock to complete levels of increasing difficulty. Each time you collect a gem the timer resets and you must rush towards the next gem as fast as you can.
